links.title: Vuzix Blade AR glasses get me excited about Apple Glasses | Cult of Mac
links.description: The best product I tried out at Mobile World Congress 2018 is the Vuzix Blade AR glasses. These smart specs superimpose a sharp, high-definition display over your regular vision. They blow away Google Glass -- and show just how cool Apple AR glasses could be.
